ðŸŒŸ Overview of the Week

Projects Worked On

Draft Assistant cli-content

Created a small CLI tool that looks at my drafts folder, shows me a few of my most recently-edited drafts and randomly picks some, and then lets me pick one to improve. It makes calls to the local LLM to generate some customized paths for improvement, and generates a few steps for improvement which the user can step through.

Studio Internal Mission Control

Creative Endeavors

Turning My Bookmarks Into A Knowledge Graph

https://youtu.be/kHknnQbIoQU
dek: In which the author creates a mystical CLI tool, delves into turning bookmarks into a knowledge graph, and sets forth on a journey towards personal growth and community engagement.
